Package it.polimi.ingsw.connection.client

Class ClientConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.MVEventSubject
it.polimi.ingsw.connection.client.ClientConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<java.lang.Object>
public class ClientConnection
extends MVEventSubject
implements Observer<java.lang.Object>
This class handle connection aspects of the distributed application. It is used by the Client as a "Network Handler" to forward and receive messages and data to/from Server.
Author:
AndreaAltomare
See Also:
github.com/emanueledelsozzo/.../Client.java

    • pingHandler

      public boolean pingHandler​(java.lang.Object o)
      Takes an Object message as an argument, determines if it is a PingMessage, then respond to the Server with a PingResponse. Returns true if the Object argument is an actual PingMessage.
      Parameters:
      o - (Object message)
      Returns:
      (Object o is an actual PingMessage ? true : false)

    • chatMessage

      public boolean chatMessage​(java.lang.Object o)
      Takes an Object message as an argument, determines if it is a ChatMessageEvent, then call the update(...) method on the Chat Message Handler (Listener). Returns true if the Object argument is an actual ChatMessageEvent.
      Parameters:
      o - (Object message)
      Returns:
      (Object o is an actual ChatMessageEvent ? true : false)
